review: this is a great police movie which i watched in recent times infact the best.police like karthi exist but very rare.all police should take karthi character as an inspiration.what a film?simply superb.i was deeply involved and screamed thrice seeing the villain.great direction..this is a must watch film....no words..karthi is simply superb.

great story... great characters and what an execution..  where there is bad, there is good too.... akki was just awesome... with that funny and fearless character... amit ji with that angry man look.... he was wonderful... and the villain ajay.. no words.... should be on everyone's bucket list....

wonderful movie amitabh bachchan's roll so much i did respect too so much ...great movie great star cast ajay devgan's best and dengerious negative roll ..akhsay kumar's secrifice for duty in love...that's amizing ....best. background music. like this movie chandangadh , best song like chandangadh,  must must must watch.....

the full credit goes to akshay kumar because in this movie he delivered 2 characters , in the first halfr a rack less officer with comic stuff and the 2nd half a tough responsible cop and perform fantastic action with best dialogues
amitabh was amazing but it is ajay devgan who owns the movie.we are so blessed to have an actor like ajay devgan! his scenes were electrifying ! i want him again in such a role!

one of the best interesting n curious movie ever i watched.. n more than that i was literally get shocked to knw this mv is a based on real incident in tn. overall the movie never make u bored rather force to watch often...
